title: Is ‘Little Suck-a-Thumb’ from a Real German Children’s Book?
subtitle: The purported German tale of a "great tall tailor" who cuts off children's thumbs was featured in a TikTok video and on Reddit.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: "Little Suck-a-Thumb," a story about a "great tall tailor" who cuts off little kids' thumbs, is from a real German children's book.
